Rotation.RotationNotes:
**Modified from Mentally, fixed where "Mind Blast" will only cast if 3 "Shadow Orbs" are present.
It will automatically apply Inner Fire, Shadowform, Vampiric Embrace if not present (while activated), use Dispersion at 5% mana and Arcane Torrent at 80% mana or bellow for most efficiency.
Careful of Mouseover, will cast DoTs and Mind Flay as well as Death and Mind Blast.
Hold your Right Alt key to cast Mass Dispel.
